price: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun saukar, zuwa gare ka, ãyõyi bayyanannu, kuma ba wanda yake kãfirta da su fãce fãsikai.*
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۖ وَمَا يَكۡفُرُ بِهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
footnotes: * Wannan ãya tana umurnin bin Alkur'ãni da aiki da shi kamar yadda ãyõyin da ke bin ta suke hana barin aiki da shi dõmin a kõma ga son zũciya kamar sihiri da surkulle waɗanda yake bin su kãfirci ne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad anzalnā ilayka āyātin bayyinātin wamā yakfuru bihā illā al-fāsiqūna
